text: The Superintendent is authorized to provide a grant to a private, nonprofit corporation that meets the eligibility criteria under § 38-1806.03 for the purposes of carrying out the duties under §§ 38-1806.04 and 38-1806.07.
historical:

DC CODE § 38-1806.02

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: District of Columbia School Reform (Public Charter Schools).

heading.catch_text: Duties of the Superintendent of the District of Columbia public schools.
